resources.string: IMPLEMENTASI PENDEKATAN K-MEANS\nDALAM MENENTUKAN EKSPRESI WAJAH\nTERHADAP SUASANA HATI
You are happy! Keep it up.
Dont worry, it just a bad day
Get up, dont just be a netral!
Pick whatever song you have!\nWe weill show you all the music you have.\nPick one song and make sure it has deep emotion.
Face your front camera,\nthe phone will take your photo automatically.
Listen to the song,\nthen express your emotion and make sure\nyou are in frame of your front camera range.
